author: 0x_qz
content: Hi, we just updated our Geth dependency from devnet-7 to devnet-8, and found there is no types.NewBlobTxWithBlobs anyone, so the blob-utils that was used to upload blobs is broken now. So is there any code snippet to demo how to send blob tx based on Geth devnet-8 code base?

author: jimmygchen
content:
`blob-utils` now supports devnet-8 if you rebuild it
https://github.com/Inphi/blob-utils

author: 0x_qz
content: Thanks for the reply, Jimmy. I can rebuild the blob-utils, but it depends on the commit #946a2dae2e9e of lightclient's Geth repo on 8/14.  If  setting the dependency as the latest commit 79f3c2d9c96b of lightclient's Geth devnet-8 branch, the compile will failed because types.NewBlobTxWithBlobs is removed from the repo. And I think the devnet-8 network is based on the latest commit of lightclient's Geth devnet-8 branch.

author: jimmygchen
content: ah i see, I'm not familiar with geth code, but I'm not aware of any recent changes to sending transactions on devnet-8. The type might have been renamed or moved in latest geth, but if you just want to use the old commit as depenency to send blobs, it should still work. (I've sent blob txs to `devnet-8` using this version of `blob-utils`)

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Yes we changed the way the type works,but as long as they are built correctly they work
